title: LeBlanc's Voice Actress is 100% on board for LeBlanc voice update / legendary skin!

embed.description: If they ever asked I would for sure!!! https://t.co/AqfLRjfZOZ

replies.body: Let's fix her kit then give her an 1820.
Let's give her a VGU first. She's starting to go down the Path of Ryze at this point...
yes! shes so tiny in game she looks like small child!

THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH HER KIT

GETTING TIRED of people preaching for another  le blanc rework
Clearly. That's why Riot's re-reworking her kit and are allowing some LeBlanc players to playtest her.

If I am not playtesting her none else should be 

I am the only player in the world who actually mastered this champion. 

AND HAD #1 le blanc world status for a while


She doesnt need a rework period

Her kit is linear, feast or famine, and isn't up to the standards of her thematic. (Deceiver, but just dives in to nuke you head on????)

She needs a full VGU, as expressed by her assassin update, because her gameplay can't be balanced around her current abilities and play patterns.

Did he just call Le blanc linear? Nice bait troll
Come to Eune and I ll destroy you in 129381319083 diff ways to the point where you ll stutter the word linear 


she is curently really balanced but whatever


LeBl AnC lInEaR .......XDDDDDDDDDD

I mean, sure she's balanced now, but any item out of line or rune that she favors gets buffed, she'll launch out of that state and into being an issue again. Her kit doesn't have nearly as many levers to balance as other champions. 

Besides, I've played against plenty of Le Blanc's to know you're simply a biased one trick that can't come to terms with reality in that her play patterns are toxic and linear. 

But sure, destroy me. I'm down to teach you the issues that Le Blanc suffers from. Not like you design champs or anything, so I understand where you're coming from. 

;)

"a biased one trick"

I can play every single fking champion atleast 2 times better then you


You never played against good le blanc since you are in irelevant division. The only place you ll see good Le blanc players is around master tier AND EVEN THEN you cannot face me since I am EUNE. So you ll never actually get to see a quallity Le blanc


A champion with 30 core combos and 918239183 posibilities is linear
Want me to fking name them?fking nonames

#I specificly main her because she is one of the least linear champions in a game




She is balanced when she isnt played by me. I estimate it ll take people 12 months of no le blanc changes to figure out revolver>sheen clone proc build



She doesnt have nearly as many levers to balance as other champions?
Sentence came straight up from your ass didnt it?

But then again Balance team has no idea what they are doing


Le blanc is already juke city when played by proper player

You want her to be reworked into some kind of distraction. ""there is no point of mindgaming if she isnt a threat""

Just cause you think you're good at the game doesn't mean you understand champion design and game health. 

And just because you've "_mastered_" a champion doesn't make you special. The game is played by millions, and the champion need to be playable and able to be played against by _everyone_ in the community. 

So keep your precious ego and cancer in EUNE. Hope you enjoy her while she's toxic.

I dont think I know I am good at a game just like you know you are a bad

It does make me special since every other Le blanc whether its faker or pawn is garbage
Yes that probably sounds cocky. 


So great by that logic make garen playable at my elo. Why should LE BLANC be playable in low elo

If I already cant access 60% of champion roster DUE TO them being fking worthless picks at high elo



#You dont deserve a right in saying whether Le blanc needs a rework or not since you dont play her yourself
She also has good popularity


#I could say that 100 champions need a rework because I dont find them fun to play myself by that logic

She was also reworked to be a deceiver already


Going on boards asking for a le blanc rework because you are nothing more then a sheep who heard riot thinks she needs another rework


So yeah bow to every single move Riot makes sheeple


EDIT: as far as fking game health goes I understand it better then entire fking balance team meddler and all the rioters
Who have been doing nothing but selling riot to tencent while progressivly ruining a game since season 3


Instead of improving they did the ruining. Its like they  set league evolution 10 years backwards
This, ladies and gentlemen, is why we don't let the community balance the game.

> [{quoted}](name=One Best Gay,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IMnltkhy,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-17T22:55:33.052+0000)
>
> Her kit is linear, feast or famine, and isn't up to the standards of her thematic. (Deceiver, but just dives in to nuke you head on????)
> 
> She needs a full VGU, as expressed by her assassin update, because her gameplay can't be balanced around her current abilities and play patterns.

why doesn't leblanc get a vgu like elementalist lux skin?

That's not a replacement for a VGU, not to mention a skin of that level takes a lot of time. Additionally, they wouldn't be able to give her a new skin if they knew she was being worked on, although currently she probably isn't.

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IMnltkhy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-15T07:28:04.855+0000)
>
> Let's fix her kit then give her an 1820.

Yes plz. Revert rework then give us skin $$$

You referring to that QRW CHUNKED 80% OF YOUR HP SO MUCH SKILLZ HURR DURR prework?

Fk no...
whats wrong with her kit?

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IMnltkhy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-15T07:28:04.855+0000)
>
> Let's fix her kit then give her an 1820.

Agreed! {{champion:7}}

I never knew she did LB's voice too. I'd hope they'd add some VO for me vs Zoe while they're at it <3.

And while they're at that, actually write some lore for Zoe that explains anything. -_-
Isn't she also J4? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
It would only be logical.

Interloc, sorry to ask an unrelated question, but it's been eating me for ages.

Which of the narrative guys are writing which characters in Noxus? I know you're doing Swain, but the rest interest me just as much.

Will be so happy if you at least give hints. I swear on my honour I won't pester anyone.

We haven't confirmed that any other Noxian characters are being worked on, stop trying to trick me into revealing things, lol!! I will say that Ant in Oz is our local expert in all things Noxus. Also, that we know you guys miss the constant faction updates, unfortunately we have limited resources at the moment (I think FauxSchizzle alone is working on four champs). But there are definitely things coming we can't talk about that you can therefore not look forward to! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Thanks! This is plenty of info already, and l thank you for all of it!

I didn't mean champs were getting worked on as in VO and etc, but I thought there would be lore updates like with the Demacia/Vastaya updates recently? 

Sorry to hear you have limited resources. I completely agree well done lore is more important than quickly done lore, so not delivering all the Noxians together with Swain is perfectly understandable. ~~I know it doesn't mean anything but if it's my glorious homeland of Noxus I'd contribute any amount of work, blood, sweat, tears and resources to helping.~~

Anyway I know Swain is going to be awesome. Also send my regards and admiration to the rest of the team for their work since what we've seen from Noxus so far has been stellar!
I can literally work on one. If i get seen as a resource xD But just one specific :D

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IMnltkhy,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-01-16T21:57:50.465+0000)
>
> Isn't she also J4? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Yep, back down the rabbit hole we go.

See you in wonderland
the voice actress is very pretty

"If they ever asked"

You can wait honey, we're stillwaiting for more skins for MF, Ahri, Lux and Yi before

> [{quoted}](name=Zatsukino,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IMnltkhy,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-15T08:10:25.637+0000)
>
> "If they ever asked"
> 
> You can wait honey, we're stillwaiting for more skins for MF, Ahri, Lux and Yi before

She voices Lux lol.

$$$

Why would she say no?
Not saying it won't happen, but they could also find a different actress.
She is a good looking woman, but man, knowing she is Lux's VA I would never tell a joke around her

Good looking lady, but my God she'd drive someone to the shadow isles or self inflicted deafing if she didn't get her way and started lux voicing all the time.

Could you imagine....

[I asked the same thing in her AMA way back when for Lux, and now we have Elementalist, and her updated VO.](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/44heqo/ama_carrie_keranen_voice_of_lux_and_more/czq81fu/)
No. Rework first
then where is the real J4?

I imagined an attractive person behind her voice.
I can confirm now, gorgeous smile. 
New VOs are really exciting! Even if not for champs I play with.
I hope you never see the voice actor for Ashe...
